Generate HTML for slider input

dot-generate_slider_html.Rd

Generate HTML for slider input

Usage

.generate_slider_html(
  input_id,
  label,
  filter_var,
  min,
  max,
  step,
  value,
  show_value,
  width,
  align,
  labels = NULL,
  size = "md",
  help = NULL,
  disabled = FALSE
)
